metadata.title: CVE-2020-8003 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
A double-free vulnerability in vrend_renderer.c in virglrenderer through0.8.1 allows attackers to cause a denial of service by triggering textureallocation failure, because vrend_renderer_resource_allocated_texture isnot an appropriate place for a free.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-8003` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvirglrenderer0 - 0.6.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: virglrenderer package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.6.0-2').
